name: CHAPEL DOWN GROUP
address: Chapel Down Group plc, Level 2, Civic Centre, Tannery Lane, Ashford, Kent, TN23 1PL
description: We are England's leading winemaker and one of the UK’s most exciting drinks companies. We produce world-class sparkling and still wines from fruit sourced from the South-East of England. Alongside wine, we craft award-winning ranges of spirits and Curious beers & ciders that each embody our winemaking heritage. We are offering free delivery to UK Mainland on orders above £75.00.
